curing_time.description: Time during which samples are in the curing oven/induction

ind_current_bonding.description: current used in induction curing process

plasma_distance.description: Distance between plasma nozzle and sample

Plasma_passes.description: Number of passes over the sample width during plasma treatment

plasma_power.description: Power of the plasma treatment process

plasma_speed.description: Speed at which plasma nozzle moves over the sample

time_between_plasma_glue.description: Time between plasma treatment and adhesive application

wt_particles.description: wt% curie particles added to allow induction heating

order.description: order number indicating the sequence of pretreatment and treatment scenarios

Plasma.description: a parameter to indicate whether the plasma treamtent is used or not

pretreatment.description: a parameter to indicate whether pretreatment is used or not

roughening.description: a parameter to indicate whether roughening treamtent is used or not.

cooling_time.description: time needed to transfer sample from induction heating to test bench

general_noise.description: noise factor to scale the level of noise on the initial contact angle of the material

noise_curing.description: noise factor to scale the level of noise during curing is not expected to have an effect as we do not see cohesive failure

noise_factor_plasma.description: noise factor to scale the level of noise during plasma treatment

noise_material.description: noise factor to scale the level of noise on strength of material

noise_temp.description: noise on temperature rise due to induction heating

number_repetitions.description: Number of repetitions for the same configuration (of a complete batch)

Width_plasma.description: assumption that plasma torch has width of 2 mm (tuned a little bit on experiments)

posttreatment.description: a parameter to indicate whether posttreatment after roughening treatment is used or not
